sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../../contexts/AuthContext'; import { BookOpenIcon, AcademicCapIcon, ChartBarIcon, BellIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; const DashboardPage = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const getRoleDisplay = (role) => { const roleMap = { 'SUPER_ADMIN': 'Super Administrator', 'INSTITUTE_ADMIN': 'Institute Administrator', 'TEACHER': 'Teacher', 'STUDENT': 'Student' }; return roleMap[role] || role; }; const getWelcomeMessage = (role) => { const messages = { 'SUPER_ADMIN': 'Welcome to the admin dashboard. Manage the entire platform.', 'INSTITUTE_ADMIN': 'Welcome to your institute dashboard. Manage your educational institution.', 'TEACHER': 'Welcome to your teaching dashboard. Create content and track student progress.', 'STUDENT': 'Welcome to your learning dashboard. Continue your educational journey.' }; return messages[role] || 'Welcome to your dashboard.'; }; const getQuickActions = (role) => { const actions = { 'SUPER_ADMIN': [ { name: 'Manage Users', icon: 'üë•', href: '/app/users' }, { name: 'Platform Stats', icon: 'üìä', href: '/app/stats' }, { name: 'System Settings', icon: '‚öôÔ∏è', href: '/app/settings' } ], 'INSTITUTE_ADMIN': [ { name: 'Manage Members', icon: 'üë•', href: '/app/members' }, { name: 'Institute Stats', icon: 'üìä', href: '/app/stats' }, { name: 'Billing', icon: 'üí≥', href: '/app/billing' } ], 'TEACHER': [ { name: 'Create Content', icon: '‚úçÔ∏è', href: '/app/content' }, { name: 'Grade Assignments', icon: 'üìù', href: '/app/assignments' }, { name: 'Student Progress', icon: 'üìà', href: '/app/progress' } ], 'STUDENT': [ { name: 'My Library', icon: 'üìö', href: '/app/library' }, { name: 'My Assignments', icon: 'üìù', href: '/app/assignments' }, { name: 'My Progress', icon: 'üìà', href: '/app/progress' } ] }; return actions[role] || []; }; return (
{/* Welcome Header */}

Welcome back, {user?.full_name || 'User'}!

{getWelcomeMessage(user?.role)}

{getRoleDisplay(user?.role)}
{/* Quick Actions */}
{getQuickActions(user?.role).map((action, index) => (
{action.icon}

{action.name}

Click to access {action.name.toLowerCase()}

))}
{/* Stats Overview */}

Total Books

24

Progress

68%

Notifications

3

Assignments

5

{/* Recent Activity */}

Recent Activity

‚úì

Completed Chapter 3: Advanced Grammar

2 hours ago

üìù

New assignment available: Essay Writing

1 day ago

üéØ

Quiz completed: Vocabulary Test

2 days ago

); }; export default DashboardPage;
